title: As Peterson Makes Waves his work will be reviewed VLOG3
description:
Peterson is making huge waves on his book tour. This will open up nearly every element of his work to greater scrutiny. Here is an article written asking questions about his lobsters analogy.

https://theconversation.com/psychologist-jordan-peterson-says-lobsters-help-to-explain-why-human-hierarchies-exist-do-they-90489
